billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Provides for the establishment of a joint budget committee on conference to resolve differences between legislation passed by the senate and assembly
summary: Provides for the establishment of a joint budget committee or conference on appropriations and proposed legislation or resolutions related to the budget to resolve differences between similar but not identical legislation passed by the senate and assembly.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to providing for a joint budget committee on conference to resolve differences between similar but not identical legislation passed by the senate and assembly
